product_name: The North Face Ventana Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: Cool-weather hikes require layers that provide coverage without causing overheating. The North Face Ventana fleece jacket with FlashDry(TM) technology speeds evaporation and keeps you comfortable. FlashDry(TM) fabric additive dramatically improves drying time and breathability without adding weight or bulk or washing out. Polyester/elastane fabric blend has a comfortable amount of stretch to move with you when you're on the trail. Strategically placed knit panels on the neck, down the upper back and under the arms allow good breathability to air out the places where you sweat the most. The North Face Ventana fleece jacket includes zippered hand pockets.
short_description: Cool-weather hikes require layers that provide coverage without causing overheating. The North Face Ventana fleece jacket with FlashDry(TM) technology speeds evaporation and keeps you comfortable.
